Threading a value through a custom pipeline macro.

Source: <https://github.com/wwbrannon/arl/blob/main/inst/examples/pipeline-macros.arl>

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
path <- system.file("examples", "pipeline-macros.arl", package = "arl")
if (path == "") path <- file.path("..", "..", "inst", "examples", "pipeline-macros.arl")
cat("```arl\n")
cat(readLines(path, warn = FALSE), sep = "\n")
cat("\n```\n")
```
